title: Firefox 118 Enters Beta Testing with the Built-In Translation Feature for Websites
description:
Firefox 118 web browser is now available for public beta testing with a built-in and automatic translation feature for websites, as well as other changes.

The post Firefox 118 Enters Beta Testing with the Built-In Translation Feature for Websites appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
